title: Seducing Her Stepfather
description: Grey Bledsoe's fantasy is to get her stepfather into bed. When she pledges a secret sorority called The Hellions her pledge task is none other than to live out her fantasy and seduce her stepfather, the powerful Senator Nicholas Vandemere.The only problem is she has to bring back proof. Proof that could ruin his career. But Nicholas himself has always told her not to let anyone stand in the way of what she wants and that morality is only a crutch for the lower classes.
author: Sinder Stone
